caption.p: EDFM-HSI of the Au-ASO mix (a) in the absence of RNA and in the presence of (c) RNA containing the viral SARS-CoV-2 gene and (e) control noninfected RNA from the Vero cells. The average of the hyperspectral data obtained from the Au-ASO mix (b) in the absence of RNA and in the presence of (d) RNA containing the viral SARS-CoV-2 gene and (f) control noninfected RNA from the Vero cells. The overlay of hyperspectral data is represented in (g).
